Structs/PathDLexer.html#/s:FV8SwiftSVG10.name: init(pathString:)
Structs/PathDLexer.html#/s:FV8SwiftSVG10.abstract: Initializer for creating a new PathDLexer from a path d string

Structs/SVGParserSupportedElements.html#.name: ElementGenerator
Structs/SVGParserSupportedElements.html#.abstract: Typealias that serves as a placeholder for a closure that returns a new SVGElement instance

Structs/SVGParserSupportedElements.html#.name: tags
Structs/SVGParserSupportedElements.html#.abstract: A dictionary of all the supported elements and attributes for a given parser.

Structs/SVGParserSupportedElements.html#.name: barebones
Structs/SVGParserSupportedElements.html#.abstract: A configuration that will only parse <path> elements and the d and fill attributes. Use this configuration if you know you will only be parsing <path> elements with fill colors

Structs/SVGParserSupportedElements.html#.name: allSupportedElements
Structs/SVGParserSupportedElements.html#.abstract: A configuration that is the full set of elements and attributes that SwiftSVG supports. This is the default configuration for the NSXMLSVGParser.

Structs/NamedColors.html#/s:iV8SwiftSVG1.name: subscript(_:)
Structs/NamedColors.html#/s:iV8SwiftSVG1.abstract: Subscript to access the named color. Must be one of the officially supported values listed here

Structs/SVGRootElement.html.name: SVGRootElement
Structs/SVGRootElement.html.abstract: Concrete implementation that creates a container from a <svg> element and its attributes. This will almost always be the root container element that will container all other SVGElement layers

Structs/NamedColors.html.name: NamedColors
Structs/NamedColors.html.abstract: A struct that represents named colors as listed here

Structs/CoordinateLexer.html.name: CoordinateLexer
Structs/CoordinateLexer.html.abstract: A struct that conforms to the Sequence protocol that takes a coordinate string and continuously returnsCGPoints

Structs/SVGPolyline.html.name: SVGPolyline
Structs/SVGPolyline.html.abstract: Concrete implementation that creates a CAShapeLayer from a <polyline> element and its attributes

Structs/SVGParserSupportedElements.html.name: SVGParserSupportedElements
Structs/SVGParserSupportedElements.html.abstract: A struct that lists all the supported elements and attributes for a parser

Structs.html#/s:V8SwiftSVG6MoveTo.name: MoveTo
Structs.html#/s:V8SwiftSVG6MoveTo.abstract: The PathCommand that corresponds to the SVG M or m command

Structs.html#/s:V8SwiftSVG9ClosePath.name: ClosePath
Structs.html#/s:V8SwiftSVG9ClosePath.abstract: The PathCommand that corresponds to the SVG Z or z command

Structs.html#/s:V8SwiftSVG6LineTo.name: LineTo
Structs.html#/s:V8SwiftSVG6LineTo.abstract: The PathCommand that corresponds to the SVG L or l command

Structs.html#/s:V8SwiftSVG16HorizontalLi.name: HorizontalLineTo
Structs.html#/s:V8SwiftSVG16HorizontalLi.abstract: The PathCommand that corresponds to the SVG H or h command

Structs.html#/s:V8SwiftSVG14VerticalLine.name: VerticalLineTo
Structs.html#/s:V8SwiftSVG14VerticalLine.abstract: The PathCommand that corresponds to the SVG V or v command

Structs.html#/s:V8SwiftSVG7CurveTo.name: CurveTo
Structs.html#/s:V8SwiftSVG7CurveTo.abstract: The PathCommand that corresponds to the SVG C or c command

Structs.html#/s:V8SwiftSVG13SmoothCurveT.name: SmoothCurveTo
Structs.html#/s:V8SwiftSVG13SmoothCurveT.abstract: The PathCommand that corresponds to the SVG S or s command

Structs.html#/s:V8SwiftSVG16QuadraticCur.name: QuadraticCurveTo
Structs.html#/s:V8SwiftSVG16QuadraticCur.abstract: The PathCommand that corresponds to the SVG Q or q command

Structs.html#/s:V8SwiftSVG22SmoothQuadra.abstract: The PathCommand that corresponds to the SVG T or t command

Structs.html#/s:V8SwiftSVG13EllipticalAr.name: EllipticalArc
Structs.html#/s:V8SwiftSVG13EllipticalAr.abstract: The PathCommand that corresponds to the SVG A or a command

Structs.html#/s:V8SwiftSVG14PathDConstan.abstract: A struct that maps <path> d commands to SVGElements

Structs/PathDLexer.html.name: PathDLexer
Structs/PathDLexer.html.abstract: A struct that conforms to the Sequence protocol that takes a <path> d string and returns SVGElement instances

Structs/SVGPolygon.html.name: SVGPolygon
Structs/SVGPolygon.html.abstract: Concrete implementation that creates a CAShapeLayer from a <polygon> element and its attributes

Protocols/SVGShapeElement.html#/s:vP8Swi.name: svgLayer
Protocols/SVGShapeElement.html#/s:vP8Swi.abstract: The CAShapeLayer that can draw the path data.

Protocols/SVGShapeElement.html#/s:vE8Swi.name: boundingBox
Protocols/SVGShapeElement.html#/s:vE8Swi.abstract: The minimum rect that encompasses all of the subpaths

Protocols/PathCommand.html#/s:vE8SwiftSV.name: canPushCommand
Protocols/PathCommand.html#/s:vE8SwiftSV.abstract: Default implementation for any PathCommand indiciating where there are enough coordinates sgtored to be able to process the SVGElement

Protocols/PathCommand.html#/s:FE8SwiftSV.name: clearBuffer()
Protocols/PathCommand.html#/s:FE8SwiftSV.abstract: Function that clears the current number buffer

Protocols/PathCommand.html#/s:FE8SwiftSV.name: pushCoordinate(_:)
Protocols/PathCommand.html#/s:FE8SwiftSV.abstract: Adds a new coordinate to the buffer

Protocols/PathCommand.html#/s:FE8SwiftSV.name: pointForPathType(_:relativeTo:)
Protocols/PathCommand.html#/s:FE8SwiftSV.abstract: Based on the PathType of this PathCommand, this function returns the relative or absolute point

Protocols/SVGParser.html#/s:vP8SwiftSVG9.name: completionBlock
Protocols/SVGParser.html#/s:vP8SwiftSVG9.abstract: A closure that is executed after all elements have been processed. Should be guaranteed to be executed after all elements have been processed, even if parsing asynchronously.

Protocols/SVGParser.html#/s:vP8SwiftSVG9.name: supportedElements
Protocols/SVGParser.html#/s:vP8SwiftSVG9.abstract: A struct listing all the elements and its attributes that should be parsed

Protocols/SVGParser.html#/s:vP8SwiftSVG9.name: containerLayer
Protocols/SVGParser.html#/s:vP8SwiftSVG9.abstract: A CALayer that will house the finished sublayers of the SVG doc.

Protocols/Fillable.html#/s:ve8SwiftSVGRx.name: fillAttributes
Protocols/Fillable.html#/s:ve8SwiftSVGRx.abstract: The curried functions to be used for the SVGShapeElement‘s default implementation. This dictionary is meant to be used in the SVGParserSupportedElements instance

Protocols/Fillable.html#/s:Fe8SwiftSVGRx.name: fill(fillColor:)
Protocols/Fillable.html#/s:Fe8SwiftSVGRx.abstract: Sets the fill color of the underlying SVGLayer

Protocols/Fillable.html#/s:Fe8SwiftSVGRx.name: fillRule(fillRule:)
Protocols/Fillable.html#/s:Fe8SwiftSVGRx.abstract: Sets the fill rule of the underlying SVGLayer. CAShapeLayers have 2 possible values: non-zero (default), and evenodd

Protocols/Fillable.html#/s:Fe8SwiftSVGRx.name: fillOpacity(opacity:)
Protocols/Fillable.html#/s:Fe8SwiftSVGRx.abstract: Sets the fill opacity of the underlying SVGLayer through its CGColor, not the CALayer’s opacity property. This value will override any opacity value passed in with the fill-color attribute.

Protocols/Fillable.html#/s:ve8SwiftSVGRx.name: fillAttributes
Protocols/Fillable.html#/s:ve8SwiftSVGRx.abstract: The curried functions to be used for the SVGGroup‘s default implementation. This dictionary is meant to be used in the SVGParserSupportedElements instance

Protocols/Fillable.html#/s:Fe8SwiftSVGRx.name: fill(fillColor:)
Protocols/Fillable.html#/s:Fe8SwiftSVGRx.abstract: Sets the fill color for all subelements of the SVGGroup

Protocols/Fillable.html#/s:Fe8SwiftSVGRx.name: fillRule(fillRule:)
Protocols/Fillable.html#/s:Fe8SwiftSVGRx.abstract: Sets the fill rule for all subelements of the SVGGroup. CAShapeLayers have 2 possible values: non-zero (default), and evenodd

Protocols/Fillable.html#/s:Fe8SwiftSVGRx.name: fillOpacity(opacity:)
Protocols/Fillable.html#/s:Fe8SwiftSVGRx.abstract: Sets the fill opacity for all subelements of the SVGGroup through its CGColor, not the CALayer’s opacity property.

Protocols/SVGContainerElement.html#/s:vP.name: containerLayer
Protocols/SVGContainerElement.html#/s:vP.abstract: The layer that stores all the SVG sublayers

Protocols/SVGContainerElement.html#/s:vP.name: attributesToApply
Protocols/SVGContainerElement.html#/s:vP.abstract: The attributes to apply to all sublayers after all subelements have been processed.

Protocols/SVGElement.html#/s:ZvP8SwiftSV.name: elementName
Protocols/SVGElement.html#/s:ZvP8SwiftSV.abstract: The element name as defined in the SVG specification

Protocols/SVGElement.html#/s:vP8SwiftSVG.name: supportedAttributes
Protocols/SVGElement.html#/s:vP8SwiftSVG.abstract: Dictionary of attributes of a given element that are supported by the SVGParser. Keys are the name of an element’s attribute such as d, fill, and rx. Values are a closure that is used to process the given attribute.

Protocols/SVGElement.html#/s:FP8SwiftSVG.name: didProcessElement(in:)
Protocols/SVGElement.html#/s:FP8SwiftSVG.abstract: An action to perform once the parser has dispatched all attributes to a given SVGElement instance

Protocols/SVGLayerType.html#/s:Fe8SwiftS.name: resizeToFit(_:)
Protocols/SVGLayerType.html#/s:Fe8SwiftS.abstract: Scales a layer to aspect fit the given size.

Protocols/StackType.html#/s:FE8SwiftSVGP.name: pop()
Protocols/StackType.html#/s:FE8SwiftSVGP.abstract: Default implementation of popping the last element off the stack

Protocols/StackType.html#/s:FE8SwiftSVGP.name: push(_:)
Protocols/StackType.html#/s:FE8SwiftSVGP.abstract: Push a new element on to the stack

Protocols/StackType.html#/s:vE8SwiftSVGP.name: count
Protocols/StackType.html#/s:vE8SwiftSVGP.abstract: Returns the number of elements on the stack

Protocols/StackType.html#/s:vE8SwiftSVGP.name: isEmpty
Protocols/StackType.html#/s:vE8SwiftSVGP.abstract: Check whether the stack is empty or not

Protocols/StackType.html#/s:vE8SwiftSVGP.name: last
Protocols/StackType.html#/s:vE8SwiftSVGP.abstract: Return the last element on the stack without popping it off the stack. Equivalent to peek in other stack implementations

Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:ve8SwiftSVGR.name: strokeAttributes
Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:ve8SwiftSVGR.abstract: The curried functions to be used for the SVGShapeElement‘s default implementation. This dictionary is meant to be used in the SVGParserSupportedElements instance

Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:Fe8SwiftSVGR.name: strokeLineCap(lineCap:)
Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:Fe8SwiftSVGR.abstract: Sets the stroke line cap of the underlying SVGLayer

Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:Fe8SwiftSVGR.name: strokeColor(strokeColor:)
Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:Fe8SwiftSVGR.abstract: Sets the stroke color of the underlying SVGLayer

Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:Fe8SwiftSVGR.name: strokeLineJoin(lineJoin:)
Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:Fe8SwiftSVGR.abstract: Sets the stroke line join of the underlying SVGLayer

Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:Fe8SwiftSVGR.name: strokeMiterLimit(miterLimit:)
Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:Fe8SwiftSVGR.abstract: Sets the stroke miter limit of the underlying SVGLayer

Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:Fe8SwiftSVGR.name: strokeWidth(strokeWidth:)
Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:Fe8SwiftSVGR.abstract: Sets the stroke width of the underlying SVGLayer

Protocols/Strokable.html.name: Strokable
Protocols/Strokable.html.abstract: A protocol that described an instance that can be stroked. Two default implementations are provided for this protocol:

Protocols/StackType.html.name: StackType
Protocols/StackType.html.abstract: A protocol that describes an instance that can act as a stack data structure

Protocols.html#/s:P8SwiftSVG13Transforma.name: Transformable
Protocols.html#/s:P8SwiftSVG13Transforma.abstract: A protocol that describes an instance that can be transformed via an SVG element’s transform attribute. Currently, matrix, rotate, scale, skewX, and skewY are supported. A default implementation is supplied for SVGContainerElements that sets the affineTransform of the container layer itself, not on all of its subelements.

Protocols.html#/s:P8SwiftSVG8Stylable.name: Stylable
Protocols.html#/s:P8SwiftSVG8Stylable.abstract: A protocol that describes instances whose attributes that can be set vis a css style string. A default implementation is supplied that parses the style string and applies the attributes using the SVGelement‘s supportedAttributes.

Protocols/SVGLayerType.html.name: SVGLayerType
Protocols/SVGLayerType.html.abstract: A protocol that describes an instance that can store bounding box information

Protocols/SVGElement.html.name: SVGElement
Protocols/SVGElement.html.abstract: A protocol describing an instance that can parse a single SVG element such as

Protocols/SVGContainerElement.html.name: SVGContainerElement
Protocols/SVGContainerElement.html.abstract: A protocol that describes an instance that can store SVG sublayers and can apply a single attributes to all sublayers.

Protocols/Fillable.html.name: Fillable
Protocols/Fillable.html.abstract: A protocol that described an instance that can be filled. Two default implementations are provided for this protocol:

Protocols.html#/s:P8SwiftSVG27CanManageA.name: CanManageAsychronousParsing
Protocols.html#/s:P8SwiftSVG27CanManageA.abstract: A protocol describing an instance that can manage elements that can parse asynchronously. In the NSXMLSVGParser implementation, the parser maintains a simple count of pending asynchronous tasks and decrements the count when an element has finished parsing. When the count has reached zero, a completion block is called

Protocols.html#/s:P8SwiftSVG20ParsesAsyn.name: ParsesAsynchronously
Protocols.html#/s:P8SwiftSVG20ParsesAsyn.abstract: A protocol describing an instance that parses asynchronously

Protocols/SVGParser.html.name: SVGParser
Protocols/SVGParser.html.abstract: A protocol describing an XML parser capable of parsing SVG data

Protocols/PathCommand.html.name: PathCommand
Protocols/PathCommand.html.abstract: A protocol that describes an instance that can process an individual SVG Element

Protocols.html#/s:P8SwiftSVG15PreviousCo.name: PreviousCommand
Protocols.html#/s:P8SwiftSVG15PreviousCo.abstract: A protocol that describes an instance that represents an SVGElement right before the current one

Protocols/SVGShapeElement.html.name: SVGShapeElement
Protocols/SVGShapeElement.html.abstract: A protocol that describes an instance that stores the path as a CAShapeLayer

Extensions/UIColor.html#/s:FE8SwiftSVGCS.name: init(svgString:)
Extensions/UIColor.html#/s:FE8SwiftSVGCS.abstract: Convenience initializer that creates a new UIColor based on a 3 or 6 digit hex string, integer functional, or named string.

Extensions/UIColor.html#/s:FE8SwiftSVGCS.abstract: Convenience initializer that creates a new UIColor based on a 3 or 6 digit hex string. The leading # character is optional

Extensions/UIColor.html#/s:FE8SwiftSVGCS.abstract: Convenience initializer that creates a new UIColor from an integer functional, taking the form rgba(rrr, ggg, bbb, <alphavalue>)

Extensions/UIColor.html#/s:FE8SwiftSVGCS.name: init(named:)
Extensions/UIColor.html#/s:FE8SwiftSVGCS.abstract: Convenience initializer that creates a new UIColor from a CSS3 named color

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:FE8SwiftSVGCSo.abstract: Convenience initializer that instantiates a new UIView for the given SVG file in the main bundle

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:FE8SwiftSVGCSo.abstract: Convenience initializer that instantiates a new UIView instance for the given SVG file at the given URL

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:FE8SwiftSVGCSo.abstract: Convenience initializer that instantiates a new UIView instance with the given SVG data

Extensions/Dictionary.html#/s:FE8SwiftSV.abstract: An extension that add the elements of one dictionary to another

Extensions/CALayer.html#/s:FE8SwiftSVGCS.name: init(SVGURL:parser:completion:)
Extensions/CALayer.html#/s:FE8SwiftSVGCS.abstract: Convenience initializer that creates a new CALayer from a local or remote URL. You must provide a completion block and add the passed SVGLayer to a sublayer.

Extensions/CALayer.html#/s:FE8SwiftSVGCS.abstract: Convenience initializer that creates a new CALayer from SVG data. You must provide a completion block and add the passed SVGLayer to a sublayer.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE8SwiftSVGSS1.abstract: Function that trims the whitespace from the beginning and end of a String

Extensions/CALayer.html.name: CALayer
Extensions/CALayer.html.abstract: A set of convenience initializers that create new CALayer instances from SVG data.

Extensions/UIView.html.abstract: A set of convenience initializers that create new UIView instances from SVG data

Extensions/UIBezierPath.html.name: UIBezierPath
Extensions/UIBezierPath.html.abstract: Convenience initializer that can parse a single path string and returns a UIBezierPath

Enums.html#/s:O8SwiftSVG8LineJoin.name: LineJoin
Enums.html#/s:O8SwiftSVG8LineJoin.abstract: Line join type that corresponds to the SVG line join string

Enums.html#/s:O8SwiftSVG7LineCap.name: LineCap
Enums.html#/s:O8SwiftSVG7LineCap.abstract: Line cap type that corresponds to the SVG line cap string

Classes/SVGPath.html#/s:FC8SwiftSVG7SVGP.name: init(singlePathString:)
Classes/SVGPath.html#/s:FC8SwiftSVG7SVGP.abstract: Initializer to to set the svgLayer‘s cgPath. The path string does not have to be a single path for the whole element, but can include multiple subpaths in the d attribute. For instance, the following is a valid path string to pass:

Classes/SVGPath.html#/s:FC8SwiftSVG7SVGP.name: parseD(_:)
Classes/SVGPath.html#/s:FC8SwiftSVG7SVGP.abstract: Function that takes a d path string attribute and sets the svgLayer‘s cgPath

Classes/SVGGroup.html#/s:vC8SwiftSVG8SVG.name: attributesToApply
Classes/SVGGroup.html#/s:vC8SwiftSVG8SVG.abstract: Store all attributes and values to be applied after all known sublayers have been added to this container

Classes/SVGGroup.html#/s:vC8SwiftSVG8SVG.name: containerLayer
Classes/SVGGroup.html#/s:vC8SwiftSVG8SVG.abstract: A CALayer that will hold all sublayers of the SVGGroup

Classes/SVGGroup.html#/s:FC8SwiftSVG8SVG.name: didProcessElement(in:)
Classes/SVGGroup.html#/s:FC8SwiftSVG8SVG.abstract: The function that is called after all of this group’s subelements have been processed. It will apply all stored attributesToApply on all sublayers

Classes/SVGView.html#/s:vC8SwiftSVG7SVGV.name: SVGName
Classes/SVGView.html#/s:vC8SwiftSVG7SVGV.abstract: The name of the SVG file in the main bundle

Classes/SVGCircle.html#/s:FC8SwiftSVG9SV.name: radius(r:)

Classes/SVGCircle.html#/s:FC8SwiftSVG9SV.abstract: Function that parses the number string and sets this instance’s x center

Classes/SVGCircle.html#/s:FC8SwiftSVG9SV.name: yCenter(y:)
Classes/SVGCircle.html#/s:FC8SwiftSVG9SV.abstract: Function that parses the number string and sets this instance’s y center

Classes/SVGCircle.html#/s:FC8SwiftSVG9SV.name: didProcessElement(in:)
Classes/SVGCircle.html#/s:FC8SwiftSVG9SV.abstract: Function that is called after the circle’s center and radius have been parsed and set. This function creates the path and sets the internal SVGLayer‘s path.

Classes/SVGCache.html#/s:ZvC8SwiftSVG8SV.name: default
Classes/SVGCache.html#/s:ZvC8SwiftSVG8SV.abstract: A singleton object that is the default store for SVGlayers

Classes/SVGCache.html#/s:iC8SwiftSVG8SVG.name: subscript(_:)
Classes/SVGCache.html#/s:iC8SwiftSVG8SVG.abstract: Subscript to get or set the SVGLayer in this cache

Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html#/s:vC8SwiftS.name: containerLayer
Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html#/s:vC8SwiftS.abstract: The SVGLayer that will contain all of the SVG’s sublayers

Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html#/s:FC8SwiftS.name: init(SVGURL:supportedElements:completion:)
Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html#/s:FC8SwiftS.abstract: Convenience initializer that can initalize an NSXMLSVGParser using a local or remote URL

Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html#/s:FC8SwiftS.name: init(SVGData:supportedElements:completion:)
Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html#/s:FC8SwiftS.abstract: Initializer that can initalize an NSXMLSVGParser using SVG Data

Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html#/s:FC8SwiftS.name: parser(_:didStartElement:namespaceURI:qualifiedName:attributes:)
Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html#/s:FC8SwiftS.abstract: The XMLParserDelegate method called when the parser has started parsing an SVG element. This implementation will loop through all supported attributes and dispatch the attribiute value to the given curried function.

Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html#/s:FC8SwiftS.name: parser(_:didEndElement:namespaceURI:qualifiedName:)
Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html#/s:FC8SwiftS.abstract: The XMLParserDelegate method called when the parser has ended parsing an SVG element. This methods pops the last element parsed off the stack and checks if there is an enclosing container layer. Every valid SVG file is guaranteed to have at least one container layer (at a minimum, a SVGRootElement instance).

Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html#/s:FC8SwiftS.name: parserDidEndDocument(_:)
Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html#/s:FC8SwiftS.abstract: The XMLParserDelegate method called when the parser has finished parsing the SVG document. All supported elements and attributes are guaranteed to be dispatched at this point, but no guarantee that all elements have finished parsing.

Classes/SVGEllipse.html#/s:FC8SwiftSVG10.name: xRadius(r:)
Classes/SVGEllipse.html#/s:FC8SwiftSVG10.abstract: Function that parses the number string and sets this instance’s x radius

Classes/SVGEllipse.html#/s:FC8SwiftSVG10.name: yRadius(r:)
Classes/SVGEllipse.html#/s:FC8SwiftSVG10.abstract: Function that parses the number string and sets this instance’s y radius

Classes/SVGEllipse.html#/s:FC8SwiftSVG10.name: xCenter(x:)
Classes/SVGEllipse.html#/s:FC8SwiftSVG10.abstract: Function that parses the number string and sets this instance’s x center

Classes/SVGEllipse.html#/s:FC8SwiftSVG10.name: yCenter(y:)
Classes/SVGEllipse.html#/s:FC8SwiftSVG10.abstract: Function that parses the number string and sets this instance’s y center

Classes/SVGEllipse.html#/s:FC8SwiftSVG10.name: didProcessElement(in:)
Classes/SVGEllipse.html#/s:FC8SwiftSVG10.abstract: Function that is called after the ellipse’s center and radius have been parsed and set. This function creates the path and sets the internal SVGLayer‘s path.

Classes/SVGLayer.html#/s:vC8SwiftSVG8SVG.name: boundingBox
Classes/SVGLayer.html#/s:vC8SwiftSVG8SVG.abstract: The minimum CGRect that fits all subpaths

Classes/SVGLayer.html#/s:vC8SwiftSVG8SVG.name: svgLayerCopy
Classes/SVGLayer.html#/s:vC8SwiftSVG8SVG.abstract: Returns a copy of the given SVGLayer

Classes/SVGLayer.html#/s:vC8SwiftSVG8SVG.name: fillColor
Classes/SVGLayer.html#/s:vC8SwiftSVG8SVG.abstract: Applies the given fill color to all sublayers

Classes/SVGLayer.html#/s:vC8SwiftSVG8SVG.name: lineWidth
Classes/SVGLayer.html#/s:vC8SwiftSVG8SVG.abstract: Applies the given line width to all CAShapeLayers

Classes/SVGLayer.html#/s:vC8SwiftSVG8SVG.name: strokeColor
Classes/SVGLayer.html#/s:vC8SwiftSVG8SVG.abstract: Applies the given stroke color to all CAShapeLayers

Classes/SVGRectangle.html.name: SVGRectangle
Classes/SVGRectangle.html.abstract: Concrete implementation that creates a CAShapeLayer from a <rect> element and its attributes

Classes/SVGLayer.html.name: SVGLayer
Classes/SVGLayer.html.abstract: A CAShapeLayer subclass that allows you to easily work with sublayers and get sizing information

Classes/SVGEllipse.html.name: SVGEllipse
Classes/SVGEllipse.html.abstract: Concrete implementation that creates a CAShapeLayer from a <ellipse> element and its attributes

Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html.name: NSXMLSVGParser
Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html.abstract: Concrete implementation of SVGParser that uses Foundation’s XMLParser to parse a given SVG file.

Classes/SVGCache.html.name: SVGCache
Classes/SVGCache.html.abstract: A minimal in-memory cache class for caching SVGLayers. The default singleton is the default cache used and you can optionally create your own static singleton through an extension.

Classes/SVGCircle.html.name: SVGCircle
Classes/SVGCircle.html.abstract: Concrete implementation that creates a CAShapeLayer from a <circle> element and its attributes

Classes/SVGView.html.name: SVGView
Classes/SVGView.html.abstract: A UIView subclass that can be used in Interface Builder where you can set the @IBInspectable propert SVGName in the side panel. Use the UIView extensions if you want to creates SVG views programmatically.

Classes/SVGGroup.html.name: SVGGroup
Classes/SVGGroup.html.abstract: Concrete implementation that creates a container from a <g> element and applies its attribites to all sublayers

Classes/SVGPath.html.name: SVGPath
Classes/SVGPath.html.abstract: Concrete implementation that creates a CAShapeLayer from a <path> element and its attributes

Classes/SVGLine.html.name: SVGLine
Classes/SVGLine.html.abstract: Concrete implementation that creates a CAShapeLayer from a <line> element and its attributes
